TopicTitle: Some GameData Folders? (is this in the right place?)

Articles.Content:
Okay, so I am tired of just downloading mods, and installing them, and having them not work, and then the whole game breaks, so im wondering if anyone is able to make a copy of their GameData folder, and send it through Dropbox or something? (that and im just too lazy)

(latest release or 1.2.2 folders please)

Edited August 9, 2017 by Slasher
Have you tried CKAN? it's an exe that can install mods for you. Also there are tutorials for installing mods.
